entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 33.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind west 30 km/h. High minus 33. Wind chill minus 52 this morning and minus 47 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 35.
